name: Doppelganger (MadMan101)
description:
Doppelganger

A game where you are joined to a doppelganger that you can send out to the adjacent tile, if it dies it means that tile is trapped however be careful when navigating the maze as your doppelganger can only die three times before you do! So you have to build a mental map and remember routes as you always start from the same place!
